name: European Union (Framework)

typical_paths.label: EU-facing alternative funds (AIF)
bullets: High-level mapping of AIF vs UCITS decision points; informational only.
Passporting and marketing depend on AIFM/ManCo structure and investor location.

marketing_notes: Cross-border marketing in the EU is governed by AIFMD/UCITS frameworks; implementation differs by Member State.
Always verify local implementation rules and any pre-marketing/marketing notification requirements.
requires_counsel_triggers: Any use of leverage, complex derivatives, or non-standard liquidity gates.
